<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Hunter's Brooch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=923)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

While wearing this silver religious symbol of [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6), you can cast the [_disrupt undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=79) cantrip as an innate divine spell.

<document level="2" id="action-707" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hunter's Brooch
